messageBody:
Use Cactus
(http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/writing/howto_testcase.html). It's
very easy to package you test and run them on server side. They also
have documentation on how to test EJB or any regular JUnit test in the
container.

For higher level testing (i.e testing like a customer), if you need to
verify something in container, then verify it in container. Don't try to
run it outside, otherwise the whole purpose of testing is lost.

--Vishal
